gw.api.domain.invoice

Class ChargeInstallmentChanger.Entry

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.domain.invoice.ChargeInstallmentChanger.Entry
  • Enclosing class:
    ChargeInstallmentChanger

    public class ChargeInstallmentChanger.Entry
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates the data required to add, remove, or modify an InvoiceItem when ChargeInstallmentChanger.execute() is called. This information includes the Amount, Type, and EventDate.

    • Method Summary

      • remove

        public ChargeInstallmentChanger.Entry remove()
        Try to remove the entry from the planned changes. ORIGINAL and MODIFIED items will be marked for remove, while ADDED items will be transitioned into ORPHANED state and removed from the list of entries.
        Returns:
        the entry that results to support builder pattern usage.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the entry is already REMOVED or if the changer is already executed.

      • canRemove

        public boolean canRemove()
        Returns true if the given Entry can be removed
        Returns:
        Whether or not the given Entry can be removed

      • revert

        public ChargeInstallmentChanger.Entry revert()
        Return this entry to the ORIGINAL state, if possible, undoing any currently planned changes (edits, adds, or removes).
        Returns:
        the entry that results to support builder pattern usage.

      • reverse

        public ChargeInstallmentChanger.Entry reverse()
        Return this entry in a reversed state if possible.
        Returns:
        the entry that results to support builder pattern usage.

      • billToday

        public ChargeInstallmentChanger.Entry billToday()
        Marks this item to be placed on an invoice with today's event date. Will create an invoice if one doesn't yet exist.
        Returns:
        the entry that results to support builder pattern usage.
